Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: With GenAi I have an instant feedback on my work and it can give me detailed answers, however it can be a bit generalized sometimes. While having a teacher give me a feedback it becomes more specific, however I don’t always get a feedback that i understand or think it’s fair.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Sometimes GENAI can be a bit generalized and when asked to give me more feedback it can be repetitive
